title: Storage Rift (Spell)
content:
Storage Rift is a spell granted upon completing the Spider's Nest quest in Hopeforest.

This spell enables the use of Storage Rifts, which can be found scattered across the map. When near a Storage Rift, activating this spell allows player characters to deposit items seamlessly across the various banks, effectively creating a centralized deposit system.

You cannot withdraw items from a Storage Rift.
